title: kalai maghaLE
sahitya:
kalai maghaLE kavi mazhai kaNDu kaLittiDumayilE


anupallavi

  ulaginil enrum OngiDum shelvamAm vaLar shuvaik-kavitaiyum vAnishaiyum tarum


caraNam    tUya pErinbam shuDar viDum maNiyE tonmarai amudinai shurandiDum kaDalE 
pAyu pEraruLinAl pal kalai nalguvAi paduma veN tavi shuraip-painshirai annamE
